# textContentSummary

**Instance Property**

A string that presents the Apple Intelligence summarization of the item.

## Declaration

```swift
var textContentSummary: String? { get }
```

## Discussion

This property represents the summary of the text that Apple Intelligence generated.

## Describing Apple Intelligence prioritization and summarization

- **isPriority**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the mail or messages content represents a prioritized item.
- **transcribedTextContent**: A string that represents the text the system transcribed.
